src:
Tysk sväng om gemensam insättningsgaranti i EU
Tysklands regering backar från flera års hårdnackat motstånd mot en gemensam insättningsgaranti i EU:s bankunion. ”Detta får man nog se som väldigt viktigt”, säger professor Lars Calmfors vid Stockholms universitet.
06 Nov 2019, 20:11 by TT

text:
German turn for joint deposit guarantee in the EU
The German government backs from years of stubborn opposition to a joint deposit guarantee in the EU's banking union. "You probably see this as very important," says Professor Lars Calmfors at Stockholm University.
06 Nov 2019, 20:11 by TT
